p: Leaves of C. camphora were collected from adult trees in the campus of Sun Yat-Sen University, on March 2019, and identified by Professor Depo Yang, School of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Sun Yat-Sen University. A voucher specimen for C. camphora (NO. A20190301) has been deposited at the School of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Sun Yat-Sen University. The EO was extracted by hydrodistillation in a Clevenger-type apparatus for 2 h, and then dehydrated by filtration with anhydrous sodium sulfate.
